name: Kids on the Block
description:
Kids on the Block is a visual novel about a teacher who tries to protect the mutated yet innocent children who are in danger of becoming a victim of an uncaring pandemic world

You are a new voluntary teacher in a new project city. When you arrive you have to wear a hazard suit, all your students are heavily disfigured or mutated. You, still in shock, decide to stay after some convincing words from your new colleagues. Within the month, you have built a wonderful relationship with your students. They have become very dear to you, each with their own quirks and specific personalities.

Everything goes well, however, then you hear something about evacuation plans because of some unstable plant nearby. You are included in the plan, the children are not. They are meant to be left behind. Now it is up to you to save the children. But beware: not everybody will be able to make it out alive.

Meet your new kids:

Rolf

Sadie

Mimi

Hanai

?
